As we mark #EarthDay2025  we are reminded of the critical role each of us plays in shaping a more sustainable future

Our commitment to environmental responsibility is at the heart of everything we do

Through our battery recycling initiatives, we will close the loop on critical minerals, reducing waste, and helping the transition toward cleaner energy 

Every battery we will recover or repurpose represents a step toward a circular economy‚Äîwhere materials are reused, not wasted

We are proud to be part of the solution, developing safe & efficient technologies that not only reduce our environmental footprint but also create long-term value

Together, we are powering a cleaner, more sustainable tomorrow     #SX #SXOOF
